public abstract class BaseSetListAction
extends BaseListAction

BaseSetListAction - extension of BaseListAction that includes necessary logic to provide functionality for displaying an RhnSet.

getSetDecl

public abstract RhnSetDecl getSetDecl()
The declaration of the set we are working with, must be one of the constants from RhnSetDecl

Returns:
the declaration of the set we are working with

processRequestAttributes

protected void processRequestAttributes(RequestContext rctx)
Add attributes to the request. Does nothing by default

Overrides:
processRequestAttributes in class BaseListAction
Parameters:
rctx - the context of the current request

populateNewSet

protected final void populateNewSet(RequestContext rctx,
                                    java.util.Iterator identifiables)
Helper method to prePopulate a new set This method is utiliy method NOT intended to be extended It can be used when overriding the 'processRequestAttributes' method A good use case for this method is when are preselecting a list of items from the global list.

Parameters:
rctx - a request context object
identifiables - A Iterator iterating over items of type "com.redhat.rhn.domain.Identifiable"

processForm

protected void processForm(RequestContext rctx,
                           ActionForm form)
Process a form. Used for adding datepickers on confirm pages (for example). By default, do nothing.

Overrides:
processForm in class BaseListAction
Parameters:
rctx - The request context
form - struts ActionForm

getSelectedItemsIterator

protected java.util.Iterator getSelectedItemsIterator(RequestContext ctx,
                                                      ActionForm form)
Extend this method to return an initial pre-selection list So the items returned here will get automatically selected in the rhn set. So when the table renders the items here will be checked.

Returns:
A Iterator iterating over items of type "com.redhat.rhn.domain.Identifiable" EMPTY_LIST.iterator() is prefered by default but we should be handling null cases also where we use this.

preClearSet

protected boolean preClearSet()
Should we clear the RhnSet for this action when beginning a new request? (i.e. *NOT* a form submission) Default behavior is to clear the set to prevent stale selections from appearing. Sub-classes can override this method if this is not desired.

Returns:
true to clear the RhnSet when starting a new pageflow, false otherwise.
